resources.comment: Query endpoint of a NuGet search proxy aggregator
Autocomplete endpoint of NuGet Search service (primary)
Azure Website based Search Service used by Gallery (Primary)
Azure Website based Search Service used by Gallery (Secondary)
Base URL of Azure storage where NuGet package registration info is stored
Base URL of Azure storage where NuGet package registration info for DNX is stored, in the format https://api.nuget.org/v3-flatcontainer/{id-lower}/{version-lower}.{version-lower}.nupkg
